raw_comment:
1. What do you notice? 
I notice that there has been an increase in coal usage as well as gasoline, which both fall under fossil fuels. 
2. What do you wonder?
I wonder how there has been an increase in fossil fuel use, when there is a lot of companies working against harmful fuel usage and activists in support of transitioning to clean energy. 
3. What impact does this have on you and your community?
This shows the popularity of different types of electricities in the world and what the trends show. If our abuse of fossil fuels continue, we will be without resources and unprepared. 
4. What's going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph's main idea.
"Fossil Fuel Use Trumps Clean Fuels"
ace_sentences: The usage of coal has increased.
The usage of gasoline has increased.
Many companies work against harmful fuel usage.
Some activists support a transition to clean energy.
I wonder how the use of fossil fuels has increased.
The graph shows the popularity of different types of electricity in the world.
The graph shows trends in electricity types in the world.
The abuse of fossil fuels may continue.
If the abuse of fossil fuels continues, we will be without resources.
If the abuse of fossil fuels continues, we will be unprepared.
The headline is: Fossil Fuel Use Trumps Clean Fuels.
